mirror.js

Summary
mirror.js
MirrorA single tab in the browser and its visual representation in the tab candy window.
Functions
triggerPaintForces the mirror in question to update its thumbnail.
foreceCanvasSizeRepaints the thumbnail with the given resolution, and forces it to stay that resolution until unforceCanvasSize is called.
unforceCanvasSizeStops holding the thumbnail resolution; allows it to shift to the size of thumbnail on screen.
TabMirrorA singleton that manages all of the Mirrors in the system.
Functions
initSet up the necessary tracking to maintain the Mirrors.
customizeAllows you to customize the tab representations as they are created.
pausePaintingTells the TabMirror to stop updating thumbnails (so you can do animations without thumbnail paints causing stutters).
resumePaintingUndoes a call to pausePainting.
isPaintingPausedReturns a boolean indicating whether painting is paused or not.

Mirror

A single tab in the browser and its visual representation in the tab candy window.  Note that it implements the Subscribable interface.

Summary
Functions
triggerPaintForces the mirror in question to update its thumbnail.
foreceCanvasSizeRepaints the thumbnail with the given resolution, and forces it to stay that resolution until unforceCanvasSize is called.
unforceCanvasSizeStops holding the thumbnail resolution; allows it to shift to the size of thumbnail on screen.

Functions

triggerPaint

triggerPaint: function()

Forces the mirror in question to update its thumbnail.

foreceCanvasSize

Repaints the thumbnail with the given resolution, and forces it to stay that resolution until unforceCanvasSize is called.

unforceCanvasSize

unforceCanvasSize: function()

Stops holding the thumbnail resolution; allows it to shift to the size of thumbnail on screen.  Note that this call does not nest, unlike TabMirror.resumePainting; if you call forceCanvasSize multiple times, you just need a single unforce to clear them all.

TabMirror

A singleton that manages all of the Mirrors in the system.

Summary
Functions
initSet up the necessary tracking to maintain the Mirrors.
customizeAllows you to customize the tab representations as they are created.
pausePaintingTells the TabMirror to stop updating thumbnails (so you can do animations without thumbnail paints causing stutters).
resumePaintingUndoes a call to pausePainting.
isPaintingPausedReturns a boolean indicating whether painting is paused or not.

Functions

init

init: function()

Set up the necessary tracking to maintain the Mirrors.

customize

customize: function(func)

Allows you to customize the tab representations as they are created.

Parameters

funca callback function that will be called every time a new tab or tabs are created. func should take in one parameter, a jQuery object representing the div enclosing the tab in question.  This jQuery object may be singular or multiple, depending on the number of tabs being created.

pausePainting

pausePainting: function()

Tells the TabMirror to stop updating thumbnails (so you can do animations without thumbnail paints causing stutters). pausePainting can be called multiple times, but every call to pausePainting needs to be mirrored with a call to resumePainting.

resumePainting

resumePainting: function()

Undoes a call to pausePainting.  For instance, if you called pausePainting three times in a row, you’ll need to call resumePainting three times before the TabMirror will start updating thumbnails again.

isPaintingPaused

isPaintingPaused: function()

Returns a boolean indicating whether painting is paused or not.
